ModulePrefs.title: 2012 Iowa Caucus Results from Google
ModulePrefs.description: View live election results for the 2012 Iowa Caucus.
ModulePrefs.author: Google, Inc.

Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript">
	var prefs = new _IG_Prefs();
	var opt = {
		appUrl: 'http://iowa2012.election-maps.appspot.com/',
		
		writeScript: function( url, nocache ) {
			document.write(
				'<script src="',
					url,
					nocache ? '?' + (+new Date) : '',
					'">',
				'<\/script>' );
		}
	};
	opt.codeUrl = prefs.getString('codeUrl');
	if( opt.codeUrl ) opt.nocache = true;
	else opt.codeUrl = opt.appUrl;
	opt.gadgetUrl = opt.appUrl + 'results-gadget.xml';
	
	opt.writeScript( opt.codeUrl + 'js/results-gadget.js', opt.nocache );
</script>
